p: Table 1 shows the descriptive analysis of data through the period 2014 to 2017. The HI ( n = 51) ranged from 0.30 to 21.50 with an average of 4.74 ± 2.10; while the BI ( n = 51) ranged from 0.30 to 21.20 with an average of 4.96 ± 2.17. The mean values observed for HI were greater than 4%, and for BI were very close to 5, indicating risk of outbreaks and epidemics. It is noteworthy that the BI was almost exactly consistent with the HI predictions.
